channel.title: Need some help with firemaking? [508]

item.title: Need some help with firemaking? [508]
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

hey guys, so i got my itemonitem firemaking working but when u burn the logs no fire shows up on the ground lol =P

heres my code

case 590: if (usedWith == 1511) { if(player.skillLvl[11] >= 1) { player.requestAnim(10011, 0); player.appendExperience(750, 11); Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(player, 1511, pi.getItemSlot(player, 1511), 1); player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "You Burn the logs."); } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "You need 1 firemaking to burn this log."); } } break;

any help is appreciated

Read full topic
